data.enText: earlier; before sth else happens or is done

data.chText: 提前两星期 / 三天 / 几小时
data.enText: two weeks/three days/a few hours beforehand

data.chText: 要是我们预先知道这事就好了。
data.enText: I wish we'd known about it beforehand.

ex.chText: 如果你预先把大部分家庭作业做完了，这个晚上你会玩得更开心。
ex.enText: If you have completed most of the homework beforehand, you'll enjoy the evening more.

ex.chText: 请事先通知我们你抵达的时间。
ex.enText: Please inform us of your arrival time beforehand.

ex.chText: 洗桑拿浴如果方法不当会有危险，浴前切忌饱食。
ex.enText: Saunas can be dangerous if misused. Avoid a big meal beforehand.

ex.chText: 你怎么会事先知道我要买一辆福特轿车？
ex.enText: How could you tell beforehand that I was going to buy a Ford?

synonyms.bx: 指在时间上先于另一事发生或完成，尤用于谈论准备或计划的事情。

ex.chText: 该酒店非常受欢迎，请务必提前预订。
ex.enText: Do book ahead/beforehand as the hotel is very popular.

ex.chText: 在冬季举行婚礼需要提前几个月作安排。
ex.enText: Winter weddings need to be arranged months ahead/beforehand.

ex.chText: 如果你预先警告我，我就不会那样做了。
ex.enText: If you had warned me ahead of time, I wouldn't have done that.
The train left 3 minutes ahead of schedule.

synonyms.bx: 词义同 beforehand，常可换用；但以 ahead of time/schedule 出现时，则其中的 ahead 不可与 beforehand 换用。

example: when you pay ahead (or in advance) you receive a discount

value.def: If you do something beforehand, you do it earlier than a particular event.

example.ex: How could she tell beforehand that I was going to go out?...
example.tran: 她怎么会事先知道我要出去？

example.ex: Saunas can be hazardous if misused. Avoid a big meal beforehand.
example.tran: 洗桑拿浴如果方法不当会有危险，浴前切忌饱食。

gramarinfo.label: usu ADV after v, also ADV with cl
